agilermi.core

Class RMIClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • agilermi.core.RMIClassLoader

  • public final class RMIClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    The instance of this class associated to a RMIRegistry can be used to load classes located on remote codebases.
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampa'

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addCodebase

        public void addCodebase(java.net.URL url)
        Adds a codebase where code of the local application can be loaded. The accepted URLs (e.g. that use specific protocols) depend by the underlyng ClassLoaderFactory used on RMIRegistry initialization. See the RMIRegistry.Builder.setClassLoaderFactory(ClassLoaderFactory) method.
        Parameters:
        url - the codebase url

      • removeCodebase

        public void removeCodebase(java.net.URL url)
        Remove a codebase that is statically loaded in this RMI environment (A codebase that contains the code of the local application). This method cannot remove remotely loaded codebases.
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the codebase to remove

      • removeCodebases

        public void removeCodebases(java.util.Collection<java.net.URL> url)
        Remove a codebase that is statically loaded in this RMI environment (A codebase that contains the code of the local application). This method cannot remove remotely loaded codebases.
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the codebase to remove

      • removeCodebases

        public void removeCodebases(java.net.URL... urls)
        Remove a codebase that is statically loaded in this RMI environment (A codebase that contains the code of the local application). This method cannot remove remotely loaded codebases.
        Parameters:
        urls - the urls of the code-bases to remove

      • getCodebasesSet

        public java.util.Set<java.net.URL> getCodebasesSet()
        Gets the set of currently active codebases.
        Returns:
        a set of active codebasess

      • clearCodebasesSet

        public void clearCodebasesSet()
        Remove all statically known codebases.
        This method cannot remove instantly the static codebases whose code is currently loaded and used in the Java Virtual Machine.
